paper.title: Regular trees and the free iterative theory

author.org: Department of Computer Science, Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago, Illinois 60616, USA

paper.venue: Journal of Computer and System Sciences
paper.abstract: Abstract This paper establishes the relationship between regular trees, equationally defined trees, and Elgotu0027s iterative algebraic theories; in particular, it provides a regular tree characterization of the free iterative theory and an equational tree characterization of the free iterative theory. These tree characterizations have implications for decision problems involving flowchart schemes interpreted in iterative theories and they also help to explicate the connections between order theoretic and non-order theoretic fixed point models for iteration.
